channel.title: open source on Hello, There
channel.description: Recent content in open source on Hello, There

item.title: Stories of code contributions to open source projects
item.description: Throughout my career as a developer, I’ve relied heavily on open source - I wouldn’t be half as productive without Github - but despite this, I’m ashamed to say that I only contributed to open source for the first time last year. I’ve had the idea of contributing for a long time, but it’s safe to say that the whole process of choosing a project to contribute to, understanding the codebase, finding the source of a bug, communicating with the maintainers, and so on, was too daunting to take the plunge.
